item.title: Setup Zephyr Development Env on Manjaro Linux and Building Sample Application for X86 Qemu
item.description: Install the dependuncies using yaourt: $ yaourt -S ninja ccache cmake gperf doxygen dfu-util dtc autoconf automake libtool Clone the zephyr repo and install requirements. $ cd ~ $ git clone https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr.git $ cd zephyr/ $ pip3 install --user -r scripts/requirements.txt $ cd .. download the zephyr sdk. $ wget https://github.

item.title: let the hacking begin
item.description: Hello, this is my first blog post. Let me Introduce myself. My name is girish joshi. I’m a software developer. Usually I work with python. I’ll be posting about Python, Raspberry-Pi, Internet Of Things and stuff like that.
